item.title: janice add a quote by Michael Chabon
item.description: "Drunk, Jane spoke as though she were Nancy Drew. I was a fool for a girl with a dainty lexicon." -- Michael Chabon

item.title: janice add a quote by Michael Chabon
item.description: "Never say love is "like" anything... It isn't." -- Michael Chabon

item.title: janice add a quote by Michael Chabon
item.description: "Man makes plans . . . and God laughs." -- Michael Chabon

item.title: janice add a quote by Michael Chabon
item.description: "It is always so simple, and so complicating, to accept an apology." -- Michael Chabon

item.title: janice add a quote by Fulton Oursler
item.description: "Many of us crucify ourselves between two thieves - regret for the past and fear of the future." -- Fulton Oursler

item.title: janice add a quote by Katharine Graham
item.description: "The longer I live, the more I observe that carrying around anger is the most debilitating to the person who bears it." -- Katharine Graham

item.title: janice add a quote by Gilda Radner
item.description: "I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end." -- Gilda Radner

item.title: janice add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: janice add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: janice add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one’s definition of your life; define yourself." -- Robert Frost

item.title: janice add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
